summary: maruse heath , the head of the philadelphia chapter of the new black panther party , was arrested in new york city for illegal gun possession .   heath , who has a tattoo in block letters on his face reading ` kill whitey ' was found carrying an unlicensed gun while wearing a bullet proof vest , when he was stopped by cops in harlem .   heath was also arrested in 2008 for intimating voters by standing outside a polling place dressed in paramilitary garb .
